Text: I,am looking for a rare album from the 60,s called the Street any luck?

Many thanks, you won't be retiring from TPB any time soon. You keep finding even more GREAT stuff.
Looking forward to Vol 3 of '80s Rare MOD, Punk & Power Pop Tunes' Pretty please. Cheers T.

Thanks 80z for fulfilling my request. The ballad from R.A.F. that I was trying to find is called Faces in the Windshield, exquisite ethereal keyboards there. The other songs are also fantastic. The other three albums are wonderful early 80s gems, thanks for sharing that as well. Cheers.

Luba, tremendous stuff, one of the most memorable contributors to the 9&1/2 Weeks soundtrack. I keep hoping one day they'll release Jack Nitzsche's wonderful score to that film. That's one 80s rarity no one has. Thanks for these anyhow Dan, you've produced the goods yet again

Thanks 80zforever, for Spot. After a couple of listens, it is still a mediocre album. Not a patch on Goonhillydown.
RAF was good though.
As a request, Do you have Jo Jo Zep - Cha from 1982. 
I bought the 12'' of the lead single, Walk On By, at the time, but have never heard the entire album.
Thanks again for your hard work, Rob

Dont know of any other way to contact you, can you help me with a song by these lyrics: 'UFO's over Idaho'
Could be the 90's

Bro, do you have some rare unreleased songs of Morten Harket(of A-ha) ?? the songs are girl, a place i know, sound of rain. And some singles of Nick Van Eede(of Cutting Crew) the songs are hold on to your heart,
rock n roll fool, all or nothing, ounce of sense, i only want to be # 1 & dicing.. If you have plzzz upload these songs...
Ishti, i will dig out the Morten Harket tracks for you, I'll upload them within the next week
